subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Vitali Klitschko gave Cris Arreola such a beating that his corner finally stepped in to stop the fight. Good thing, because Arreola was not about to quit by himself.
snippet: Vitali Klitschko gave Cris Arreola such a beating that his corner finally stepped in to stop the fight. Good thing, because Arreola was not about to quit by himself.
